name: DDP vs FOB Comparator (USD/1k, 2026)
description: Estimate landed USD per 1,000 bottles under DDP vs FOB assumptions.

outputs.name: fob1k
outputs.label: FOB cost (logistics only)
outputs.explain: Often treated as 0 when focusing on logistics deltas

outputs.name: breakeven
outputs.label: DDP↔FOB break-even freight
outputs.explain: Freight at which DDP equals FOB under given duty/inland

logic: DDP1k = (feu/units*1000) + (duty% * cif1k) + (inland/units*1000); Breakeven ≈ function(duty, inland, cif1k).
notes: Refine with corridor-specific surcharges, demurrage/detention risks, and insurance.
